issue.title: [CF 1510] Bar color per spell
issue.body:
Trying to recreate the setup from RoguePowerBars addon, which finally stopped working in 8.0. There, you could set up a group of spells to be shown as bars and select a solid color for each bar independently. In TMW, it seems that you can only set up the bar color per whole group?

 

Is it possible to set up different color bars for spells within one group? If not, can this issue be a request to implement this?


> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien | Imported from CurseForge issue #1510 | Raw

comments.body:
Found it, the setting is under individual icon > Timer Bar > Override Group Color

 

Sorry about this issue, closing.


> Posted by CurseForge user nordveien
